name: Vape Escape (itch)
description:
You're an alien vapor trapped in a science lab on Earth!

Possess the Humans and find all the keys to power the portal and escape to your home world.

Being incorporeal can be a real drag sometimes.

Made for Whitevaults 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam!

Theme: A Strange Influence, Limit: minimum 3 items

All assets were made during a two week period for the  Game Jam with the exception of:

  • Pixel Art Sci-Fi Theme for Godot by Azagaya: https://azagaya.itch.io/sci-fi-theme
  • Music randomly generated by ecrett music app: https://ecrettmusic.itch.io/ecrett-music
  • Minor SFX from previous projects
